name: Repulsive Attraction
description:
Description

Repulsive Attraction is a puzzle game solo-developed for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam! Control a Proton and Electron and attract and repel to reach the end goal.  

The theme of the jam is "Joined Together".

Controls

Left Mouse Button (LMB) - Swap between proton and electron

RightMouse Button (RMB) - Swap between proton and electron

AD Keys- Move left and right. Control 2 characters at once

Music

All the Music in the Game was made by TeknoAXE's Royalty Free Music on Youtube

Link to Composer: https://www.youtube.com/c/teknoaxe
